replies.author: mixturebbq
replies.txt_content:
mcpc要用java7开,java8不支持mcpc的
还有LZ是mcpc不是ncpc.....

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: mixturebbq
replies.txt_content:
mclele 发表于 2014-11-7 19:16
那怎么弄
@echo OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar cauldron-1.6.4-1.965.21.60-server.jar

PAUSE

replies.author: mixturebbq
replies.txt_content:
mclele 发表于 2014-11-7 19:16
那怎么弄
最主要还是"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe"
把jre8改成jre7,其他别乱动就行
后面的不用和我一样

replies.author: 懶懶
replies.txt_content:
下载个JAVA7 
www.java.com/zh_CN/download/manual.jsp 可以试试在这里下载
然后在启动器编辑里
把JAVA改成"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe"  
可以尝试一下
